table.caption: Table 61 – Clipping Path Operators
head: Operands
Operator
Description
rows: Modify the current clipping path by intersecting it with the current path, using the nonzero winding number rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.
Modify the current clipping path by intersecting it with the current path, using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.
